meanings.sent1: The reeky garbage bin made the whole alley smell bad.
meanings.sent2: The reeky socks needed to be washed immediately.
meanings.sent3: The reeky cheese was so stinky, it could walk itself to the trash.
meanings.sent4: The reeky smell of failure hung heavy in the air.
meanings.sent5: The reeky odor was so overpowering, it made my eyes water.

meanings.definition: Covered in a layer of soot or grime.
meanings.sent1: The reeky fireplace left black marks on the walls.
meanings.sent2: The reeky car looked like it hadn't been washed in years.
meanings.sent3: The reeky old book had so much dust, it could be mistaken for a mini dust storm.
meanings.sent4: The reeky streets were like a canvas painted with dirt.
meanings.sent5: The reeky walls of the cave were dark with soot.

meanings.sent1: The reeky room was so smoky, you could barely see across it.
meanings.sent2: The reeky factory emitted thick fumes into the sky.
meanings.sent3: The reeky chimney was like a dragon breathing out smoke.
meanings.sent4: The reeky air in the kitchen made my eyes water.
meanings.sent5: The reeky car exhaust filled the street with fumes.
